Title: Directs the public service commission to formulate a process, rules and regulations for the regulation of the charges and fees of internet and cable providers
Summary: Directs the public service commission to formulate a process, rules and regulations for the regulation of the charges and fees of internet and cable providers.
LawCode: Amd ยง215, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to directing the public service commission to formulate a process, rules and regulations for the regulation of the charges and fees of internet and cable providers
